author: Rebecca Klar
title: Connecticut confirms death of 6-week-old baby linked to coronavirus
description: Connecticut Gov. Ned Lamont (D) on Wednesday confirmed that a 6-week-old baby had died from complications related to the novel coronavirus, marking the state's first pediatric death attributed to the disease....
content:
Connecticut Gov. Ned Lamont (D) on Wednesday confirmed that a 6-week-old baby had died from complications related to the novel coronavirus, marking the state's first pediatric death attributed to the disease. 
Lamont said officials believe the state's fatali… [+1364 chars]
